/**
 * Radio Component - Single selection from a group.
 *
 * @example
 * ```tsx
 * import { Radio } from '@orion-ds/react';
 *
 * <Radio label="Option A" name="choice" value="a" />
 * <Radio label="Option B" name="choice" value="b" />
 * <Radio label="Option C" name="choice" value="c" checked />
 * ```
 */
export { Radio } from './Radio';
export type { RadioProps, RadioSize } from './Radio.types';

props.name: helperText
props.description: Helper text displayed below the radio.

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Accessible label for screen readers when no visible label is provided.

props.name: aria-describedby
props.description: Additional element IDs that describe this radio.

examples.title: Radio group
examples.code:
<Radio name="plan" label="Free" value="free" />
<Radio name="plan" label="Pro" value="pro" />
<Radio name="plan" label="Enterprise" value="enterprise" />
